about_the_game:
Making games takes time and can be costly. As such, this DLC is meant as a form of donation to the developer, so they can continue working on many more games!

This DLC includes a WAV file of the main soundtrack for The Human Test, which will be added to the game files.
detailed_description:
Making games takes time and can be costly. As such, this DLC is meant as a form of donation to the developer, so they can continue working on many more games!

This DLC includes a WAV file of the main soundtrack for The Human Test, which will be added to the game files.
name: The Human Test / Restart - Medium Donation

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: The Human Test / Restart - Medium Donation - $5.99

package_groups.title: Buy The Human Test / Restart - Medium Donation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Those are the main game's specifications. The DLC only contains a 579MB WAV file!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Those are the main game's specifications. The DLC only contains a 579MB WAV file!

short_description: This DLC is meant as a form of donation to the developer, so they can continue working on many more games! It includes a WAV file of the main soundtrack for The Human Test, which will be added to the game files.
